_comment_httpPort: Port for the HTTP API server
_comment_host: Bind address - use 0.0.0.0 for Docker to allow external connections
_comment_wsPort: Port for internal WebSocket communication between browser and server
_comment_streamingMode: Streaming mode: 'real' for true streaming, 'fake' for pseudo-streaming
_comment_failureThreshold: Number of consecutive failures before switching to next account (0 to disable)
_comment_switchOnUses: Number of successful requests before auto-switching account (0 to disable)
_comment_maxRetries: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed requests
_comment_retryDelay: Delay in milliseconds between retry attempts
_comment_browserExecutablePath: Custom browser executable path (null for auto-detect)
_comment_apiKeys: Array of valid API keys (empty array means use default key: 123456)
_comment_immediateSwitchStatusCodes: HTTP status codes that trigger immediate account switch
